The Swarm () is a 1990 Soviet drama film directed by Vladimir Khotinenko.
Plot
The film tells about the life of the Zavarzins family, who in 1909 went to live in Siberia and founded an apiary there.
Cast
* Vladimir Ilyin
* Cheslav Sushkevich
* Ivan Agafonov
* V. Andrianov
* Oleg Belov
* Aleksandr Cheskidov
* Natalya Churkina
* Sergey Fetisov
* Boris Galkin
* Gennadiy Garbuk
